summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AmruthAI Business Leads CRM. Backend APIs working well (92.9% success rate) with one validation issue. Frontend UI fully functional with all CRUD operations, search, filters, and real-time stats updates working correctly. Integration between frontend and backend working seamlessly.

validation_bugs.issue: API allows creating leads with empty business_name and mobile_number fields
validation_bugs.expected_behavior: Should return 422 validation error for empty required fields
validation_bugs.actual_behavior: Returns 200 and creates lead with empty fields

passed_tests: Dashboard stats display correctly (Total Leads, Interested, Not Interested, Callbacks, No Response, Switched Off)
Add Lead functionality - dialog opens, form fills, submission works
Leads table displays data correctly with all columns (S.No, Business Name, Website, Mobile Number, Status, Actions)
Edit Lead functionality - dialog opens, fields modify, changes save
Delete Lead functionality - dialog opens, deletion confirmed, lead removed
Status dropdown in table row - change status directly from table
Website toggle in table row - toggle website yes/no
Search functionality - search by business name or mobile number
Status filter dropdown - filter leads by status
Stats update correctly after CRUD operations
Backend API endpoints working (GET /api/leads, GET /api/leads/stats, POST /api/leads, PUT /api/leads/{id}, DELETE /api/leads/{id})
Black and yellow theme implemented correctly
All data-testid attributes present for testing
action_item_for_main_agent: Add validation to backend API to prevent creating leads with empty business_name and mobile_number fields. Should return 422 status code with validation error message when required fields are empty.
